company_info.Company Description: Dear Applicant,Are you looking for more than just a job? Then join our Company United States.We offer flexible schedules, competitive benefits and a supportive work environment.Email idseacruiserecruitment@outlook.comBest RegardsRecruitment Manager.

jd_information.description: Deck Cadet Job Description. Be it on a military vessel or a luxury cruise liner, a Deck Cadet assists in the day-to-day operations and maintenance of the ship. They may help with preparations prior to departure, navigation, safety and maintenance duties and cargo related issues.
